default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Just as glass can't trap a shadow, this can't trap me. Stop wasting your effort, Chief of Minos. You adults only ever make things worse.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: No one will find me as long as I don't expose myself to sunlight.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Every inch of shadow in the DisCity belongs to me.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The shadows... are gathering toward me.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: No! ...It'll stunt height growth.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Kids shouldn't be in this kind of place.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: You want me to deal with... this?

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Haha, I knew it. Nothing will change.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Shadow... follows.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: It's so dark... so cold...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: I have nothing to do with the troubles caused by "the Homeless." I'm not the leader and didn't give any orders. They're just using my name. But... are the naughty kids in Syndicate giving you a headache? Haha. You get what you deserve.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: You're a mature adult. What help can a kid give you?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: No one wants to be born in Syndicate, where lies and violence always prevail. I have given up. It isn't too much to ask to want to stay away, right?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: It... isn't too bad here. The bed in the bedroom is much softer than the one in Syndicate.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: That on the wall is the emblem of "the Homeless." If you wish to join, just draw one yourself... but you're not qualified just from age alone.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Can the space for Sinners be expanded somewhat? It's not that I hate cramped spaces. It just... reminds me of bad memories. Or... perhaps... you can keep me company for a bit.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: You... are a strange adult. If all the adults in Syndicate were like you, I guess we would suffer a lot less ...Why didn't you come sooner...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Chief of Minos, please be aware of the shadow in the room. You almost ran into me.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Ahâ€”a time to relax, finally. No mission and no one to bother me.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: ...Do all you adults like doing this?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Huh? I have to work here?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Cough... I knew I wasn't used to moving about under the sun...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: ...When you gaze at the shadows, the shadows are gazing back at you. Your gaze is very intense.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Level Up
eternal_night_hunt.text: Shadow, do you smell that rotting, bloody stench... It's time to eat.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Pat Head
eternal_night_hunt.text: Ears, shadows, eyes... Still don't understand? I'm not some red-hooded kid who gets bullied so easily.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Obtain Attire
eternal_night_hunt.text: Are you still listening to those corny stories? Take a good look at what our "fairy tales" really look like...

eternal_night_hunt.title: Greeting
eternal_night_hunt.text: Hey, stay here and don't go out. In the forest... even someone like you will be gobbled up like a little rabbit.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Ordinary Contact 1
eternal_night_hunt.text: Those bastards use fairy tales to trick kids into being kind. Then they exploit their kindness, hurt them, and finally discard them like trash... I won't be fooled anymore.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Ordinary Contact 2
eternal_night_hunt.text: Do you really believe the Big Bad Wolf will spit out meat that's already in his mouth? He will only take bite after bite until the prey is completely eaten.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Ordinary Contact 3
eternal_night_hunt.text: You want some "Little Red Riding Hood" cookies too? Sure, but... don't ask what they're made of.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Ordinary Contact 4
eternal_night_hunt.text: No one would give up their prey to a little girl in a dress. You'd have to be stronger than they are.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Idle
eternal_night_hunt.text: Shush, wait a bit longer, the night is still young... We belong to the depths of darkness.

eternal_night_hunt.title: Special Attention
eternal_night_hunt.text: Don't get your hopes up. I won't play house with you.

lucida_mystica.title: Level Up
lucida_mystica.text: Stars... look how they cluster here.

lucida_mystica.title: Obtain Attire
lucida_mystica.text: This is the witch's market, not a place for you kiddo... Oh, you're lost? Alright, give me your most precious treasure. I'll trade it for a star that will safely get you home.

lucida_mystica.title: Greeting
lucida_mystica.text: What are you doing here again? Fine, tell me, what are you going to trade this time to get yourself home? Just so you know, I don't take any wild flowers, no matter how big the bouquet.

lucida_mystica.title: Ordinary Contact 1
lucida_mystica.text: A lollipop, is that really your most precious thing? Put it on the scale. If it balances, you'll get this star... Well, lucky you, it's balanced.

lucida_mystica.title: Ordinary Contact 2
lucida_mystica.text: Don't scamper about in this market. Those tents may look pretty, but if you walk into the wrong one, you'll end up in a heap of trouble.

lucida_mystica.title: Idle
lucida_mystica.text: Whew, finally, all you menaces are back home. Why are so many kiddos wandering in here lately? I'm running out of space for all these lollipops and dolls...

lucida_mystica.title: Annoyed
lucida_mystica.text: Tsk... You're the most annoying curious little brat. This cloak is made from a tiny piece of the starry sky; if you fall in, you'll never get out.

lucida_mystica.title: Special Attention
lucida_mystica.text: You've got your star, why are you still staring at me? Better think about how many more treasures you have left to trade... Remember, next time you come out to play, don't lose your way.
